name: Flo the White Rabbit
description:
A project started to share my love for the Twitter Sonic OC community and involve many of the creative OCs from the talented people there!

Right now it is very short and there is only 2 (3 counting the super secret character) characters to talk to and one item to collect (quest?) but I plan to work on that in the coming months! Talking to the same character twice may yield different greetings!

There is no ending as of yet but talking to the final character might prove challenging! I also plan to make it playable in the browser.

If you'd like to report any bugs or want to request features or for your OC to be in the game please join my Discord server: discord.gg/E8s3T33wj3
